definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Many disaster will happen every day in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在這個世界上，天天都邑發生很多災難性的工作。

sentences.english: Contemporary society, people have produced the serious self-contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 當代社會人的自我矛盾甚至自我分裂已是災難性問題。

sentences.english: The puppet troops suffered disastrous defeat.
sentences.chinese: 僞軍遭到了災難性的失敗。

sentences.english: If you don't, then his catastrophic conclusions are irrelevant.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不信，那他得出的災難性結論就根本不足爲慮。

sentences.english: The disallowed goal was a disaster for the team.
sentences.chinese: 那個進球被判無效對球隊來說是個災難性的打擊。

sentences.english: Emerging economies, for the most part, avoided this disastrous over-borrowing.
sentences.chinese: 而新興市場經濟體大多避免了災難性的過度借貸。

sentences.english: "Shout" of a , the beard worked properly Feng to fling out disaster one net.
sentences.chinese: “呼”的一聲，胡靈峯扔出了災難性的一網。

sentences.english: For other disaster scenarios, go for gold.
sentences.chinese: 而要是其他的災難性狀況，就應該買黃金。

sentences.english: Some of these comets would have slammed into Earth, causing catastrophic results to life.
sentences.chinese: 其中一些彗星會衝向地球，給生物帶來災難性的後果。

sentences.english: By eliminating this ticking time-bomb, the possibility of serious accidents had been ruled out.
sentences.chinese: 剷除了一顆定時炸彈，避免了災難性事故的發生。

sentences.english: For workers, the shutdowns and job losses are devastating.
sentences.chinese: 對於工人來說，停產和裁員是災難性的。

sentences.english: The only option would be a catastrophic default.
sentences.chinese: 屆時唯一的選擇將是災難性的違約。

sentences.english: The social consequences could be disastrous, and could give political hard-liners a leg up.
sentences.chinese: 其社會後果可能是災難性的，同時會觸怒強硬派分子。

sentences.english: The epidemic of catastrophic bee losses is called Colony Collapse Disorder (CCD).
sentences.chinese: 導致蜜蜂災難性損失的流行病稱爲羣體性癱瘓失調。

sentences.english: A short-term correction would be painful, but hardly catastrophic.
sentences.chinese: 短期調整是痛苦的，但絕不會是災難性的。

sentences.english: Metal Migration has been the cause of many catastrophic microcircuit failures.
sentences.chinese: 金屬遷移能導致混合微電路發生災難性失效。
